mapper.select: SELECT chartseq, year, one, two, three FROM chart ORDER BY chartseq

SELECT A.*, B.* FROM ( SELECT TT1.rnum as num, TT1.title, TT1.categoryNumber, TT1.views, TT1.likes, CASE WHEN TRUNC(TT1.writtenDate) = TRUNC(SYSDATE) THEN TO_CHAR(TT1.writtenDate, 'HH24:MI') ELSE TO_CHAR(TT1.writtenDate, 'YYYY/MM/DD') END AS writtenDate, TT1.nickname, TT1.postNumber FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, t1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM board WHERE categoryNumber = #{categoryNumber} ORDER BY likes DESC ) t1 WHERE ROWNUM >= 1 ) TT1 WHERE rnum <=5 ) A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(postNumber) totalCnt FROM board WHERE categoryNumber = #{categoryNumber} ) B
